description: Returns information about a deployment target.

parameters.name: deploymentId
parameters.description: The unique ID of a deployment.

parameters.name: targetId
parameters.description: The unique ID of a deployment target.

nested_items.name: deploymentTarget
nested_items.description: A deployment target that contains information about a deployment such as its status, lifecycle events, and when it was last updated. It also contains metadata about the deployment target. The deployment target metadata depends on the deployment target's type ( instanceTarget, lambdaTarget, or ecsTarget).

nested_items.name: deploymentTargetType
nested_items.description: The deployment type that is specific to the deployment's compute platform or deployments initiated by a CloudFormation stack update.

nested_items.name: instanceTarget
nested_items.description: Information about the target for a deployment that uses the EC2/On-premises compute platform.

nested_items.name: deploymentId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of a deployment.

nested_items.name: targetId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of a deployment target that has a type of instanceTarget.

nested_items.name: targetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the target.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status an EC2/On-premises deployment's target instance.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the target instance was updated by a deployment.

nested_items.name: lifecycleEvents
nested_items.description: The lifecycle events of the deployment to this target instance.

nested_items.name: lifecycleEventName
nested_items.description: The deployment lifecycle event name, such as ApplicationStop, BeforeInstall, AfterInstall, ApplicationStart, or ValidateService.

nested_items.name: diagnostics
nested_items.description: Diagnostic information about the deployment lifecycle event.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The associated error code:
Success: The specified script ran.
ScriptMissing: The specified script was not found in the specified location.
ScriptNotExecutable: The specified script is not a recognized executable file type.
ScriptTimedOut: The specified script did not finish running in the specified time period.
ScriptFailed: The specified script failed to run as expected.
UnknownError: The specified script did not run for an unknown reason.

nested_items.name: scriptName
nested_items.description: The name of the script.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The message associated with the error.

nested_items.name: logTail
nested_items.description: The last portion of the diagnostic log.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that indicates when the deployment lifecycle event started.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that indicates when the deployment lifecycle event ended.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The deployment lifecycle event status:
Pending: The deployment lifecycle event is pending.
InProgress: The deployment lifecycle event is in progress.
Succeeded: The deployment lifecycle event ran successfully.
Failed: The deployment lifecycle event has failed.
Skipped: The deployment lifecycle event has been skipped.
Unknown: The deployment lifecycle event is unknown.

nested_items.name: instanceLabel
nested_items.description: A label that identifies whether the instance is an original target ( BLUE) or a replacement target ( GREEN).

nested_items.name: lambdaTarget
nested_items.description: Information about the target for a deployment that uses the Lambda compute platform.

nested_items.name: deploymentId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of a deployment.

nested_items.name: targetId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of a deployment target that has a type of lambdaTarget.

nested_items.name: targetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the target.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status an Lambda deployment's target Lambda function.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the target Lambda function was updated by a deployment.

nested_items.name: lifecycleEvents
nested_items.description: The lifecycle events of the deployment to this target Lambda function.

nested_items.name: lifecycleEventName
nested_items.description: The deployment lifecycle event name, such as ApplicationStop, BeforeInstall, AfterInstall, ApplicationStart, or ValidateService.

nested_items.name: diagnostics
nested_items.description: Diagnostic information about the deployment lifecycle event.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The associated error code:
Success: The specified script ran.
ScriptMissing: The specified script was not found in the specified location.
ScriptNotExecutable: The specified script is not a recognized executable file type.
ScriptTimedOut: The specified script did not finish running in the specified time period.
ScriptFailed: The specified script failed to run as expected.
UnknownError: The specified script did not run for an unknown reason.

nested_items.name: scriptName
nested_items.description: The name of the script.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The message associated with the error.

nested_items.name: logTail
nested_items.description: The last portion of the diagnostic log.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that indicates when the deployment lifecycle event started.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that indicates when the deployment lifecycle event ended.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The deployment lifecycle event status:
Pending: The deployment lifecycle event is pending.
InProgress: The deployment lifecycle event is in progress.
Succeeded: The deployment lifecycle event ran successfully.
Failed: The deployment lifecycle event has failed.
Skipped: The deployment lifecycle event has been skipped.
Unknown: The deployment lifecycle event is unknown.

nested_items.name: lambdaFunctionInfo
nested_items.description: A LambdaFunctionInfo object that describes a target Lambda function.

nested_items.name: functionName
nested_items.description: The name of a Lambda function.

nested_items.name: functionAlias
nested_items.description: The alias of a Lambda function. For more information, see Lambda Function Aliases in the Lambda Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: currentVersion
nested_items.description: The version of a Lambda function that production traffic points to.

nested_items.name: targetVersion
nested_items.description: The version of a Lambda function that production traffic points to after the Lambda function is deployed.

nested_items.name: targetVersionWeight
nested_items.description: The percentage of production traffic that the target version of a Lambda function receives.

nested_items.name: ecsTarget
nested_items.description: Information about the target for a deployment that uses the Amazon ECS compute platform.

nested_items.name: deploymentId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of a deployment.

nested_items.name: targetId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of a deployment target that has a type of ecsTarget.

nested_items.name: targetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the target.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the target Amazon ECS application was updated by a deployment.

nested_items.name: lifecycleEvents
nested_items.description: The lifecycle events of the deployment to this target Amazon ECS application.

nested_items.name: lifecycleEventName
nested_items.description: The deployment lifecycle event name, such as ApplicationStop, BeforeInstall, AfterInstall, ApplicationStart, or ValidateService.

nested_items.name: diagnostics
nested_items.description: Diagnostic information about the deployment lifecycle event.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The associated error code:
Success: The specified script ran.
ScriptMissing: The specified script was not found in the specified location.
ScriptNotExecutable: The specified script is not a recognized executable file type.
ScriptTimedOut: The specified script did not finish running in the specified time period.
ScriptFailed: The specified script failed to run as expected.
UnknownError: The specified script did not run for an unknown reason.

nested_items.name: scriptName
nested_items.description: The name of the script.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The message associated with the error.

nested_items.name: logTail
nested_items.description: The last portion of the diagnostic log.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that indicates when the deployment lifecycle event started.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that indicates when the deployment lifecycle event ended.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The deployment lifecycle event status:
Pending: The deployment lifecycle event is pending.
InProgress: The deployment lifecycle event is in progress.
Succeeded: The deployment lifecycle event ran successfully.
Failed: The deployment lifecycle event has failed.
Skipped: The deployment lifecycle event has been skipped.
Unknown: The deployment lifecycle event is unknown.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status an Amazon ECS deployment's target ECS application.

nested_items.name: taskSetsInfo
nested_items.description: The ECSTaskSet objects associated with the ECS target.

nested_items.name: identifer
nested_items.description: A unique ID of an ECSTaskSet.

nested_items.name: desiredCount
nested_items.description: The number of tasks in a task set. During a deployment that uses the Amazon ECS compute type, CodeDeploy instructs Amazon ECS to create a new task set and uses this value to determine how many tasks to create. After the updated task set is created, CodeDeploy shifts traffic to the new task set.

nested_items.name: pendingCount
nested_items.description: The number of tasks in the task set that are in the PENDING status during an Amazon ECS deployment. A task in the PENDING state is preparing to enter the RUNNING state. A task set enters the PENDING status when it launches for the first time, or when it is restarted after being in the STOPPED state.

nested_items.name: runningCount
nested_items.description: The number of tasks in the task set that are in the RUNNING status during an Amazon ECS deployment. A task in the RUNNING state is running and ready for use.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the task set. There are three valid task set statuses:
PRIMARY: Indicates the task set is serving production traffic.
ACTIVE: Indicates the task set is not serving production traffic.
DRAINING: Indicates the tasks in the task set are being stopped and their corresponding targets are being deregistered from their target group.

nested_items.name: trafficWeight
nested_items.description: The percentage of traffic served by this task set.

nested_items.name: targetGroup
nested_items.description: The target group associated with the task set. The target group is used by CodeDeploy to manage traffic to a task set.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: For blue/green deployments, the name of the target group that instances in the original environment are deregistered from, and instances in the replacement environment are registered with. For in-place deployments, the name of the target group that instances are deregistered from, so they are not serving traffic during a deployment, and then re-registered with after the deployment is complete.

nested_items.name: taskSetLabel
nested_items.description: A label that identifies whether the ECS task set is an original target ( BLUE) or a replacement target ( GREEN).

nested_items.name: cloudFormationTarget
nested_items.description: Information about the target to be updated by an CloudFormation blue/green deployment. This target type is used for all deployments initiated by a CloudFormation stack update.

nested_items.name: deploymentId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of an CloudFormation blue/green deployment.

nested_items.name: targetId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of a deployment target that has a type ofÂ  CloudFormationTarget.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the target application was updated by an CloudFormation blue/green deployment.

nested_items.name: lifecycleEvents
nested_items.description: The lifecycle events of the CloudFormation blue/green deployment to this target application.

nested_items.name: lifecycleEventName
nested_items.description: The deployment lifecycle event name, such as ApplicationStop, BeforeInstall, AfterInstall, ApplicationStart, or ValidateService.

nested_items.name: diagnostics
nested_items.description: Diagnostic information about the deployment lifecycle event.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The associated error code:
Success: The specified script ran.
ScriptMissing: The specified script was not found in the specified location.
ScriptNotExecutable: The specified script is not a recognized executable file type.
ScriptTimedOut: The specified script did not finish running in the specified time period.
ScriptFailed: The specified script failed to run as expected.
UnknownError: The specified script did not run for an unknown reason.

nested_items.name: scriptName
nested_items.description: The name of the script.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The message associated with the error.

nested_items.name: logTail
nested_items.description: The last portion of the diagnostic log.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that indicates when the deployment lifecycle event started.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that indicates when the deployment lifecycle event ended.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The deployment lifecycle event status:
Pending: The deployment lifecycle event is pending.
InProgress: The deployment lifecycle event is in progress.
Succeeded: The deployment lifecycle event ran successfully.
Failed: The deployment lifecycle event has failed.
Skipped: The deployment lifecycle event has been skipped.
Unknown: The deployment lifecycle event is unknown.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of an CloudFormation blue/green deployment's target application.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type for the CloudFormation blue/green deployment.

nested_items.name: targetVersionWeight
nested_items.description: The percentage of production traffic that the target version of an CloudFormation blue/green deployment receives.
